note.p: Education: Harrow School; Corpus Christi College, Cambridge. BA (1760, 2nd Wrangler), MA (1763), DD (1775)

Career: Ordained deacon (1762); ordained priest (1763); Vicar, Fulham, Middlesex; Rector, Orsett, Essex (1766); Rector, Much Hadham with Little Hadham, Hertfordshire; Vicar, St Martin in the Fields, London (1776); Archdeacon of Colchester ; Chaplain to the King
